100.Title: Submitted
100.Description: Your request has been received and will be processed shortly.

110.Title: Under Review
110.Description: Our team is currently evaluating your submission. You'll be notified once the review is complete.

120.Title: In Transit To Repair Facility
120.Description: Your item is on its way to our repair facility. Please wait for further updates.

130.Title: Inspection
130.Description: Your item is being inspected by our professional technicians. We'll let you know once the inspection is complete.

140.Title: Repair
140.Description: Your item is currently under repair. We'll update you on the progress shortly.

150.Title: In Transit From Repair Facility
150.Description: Repairs complete! Your item is now on its way back to you. Expect it to arrive soon.

160.Title: Delivered
160.Description: Delivery successful! Your item should now be with you. Thank you for choosing us.
